channel.title: RuneWave- New Community ll Need Staff ll Bosses ll Active Owner ll Please Come
channel.description:
[URL=http://s1380.photobucket.com/user/Akelly6200/media/banner_zps77735a95.png.html][IMG]http://i1380.photobucket.com/albums/ah194/Akelly6200/banner_zps77735a95.png[/img][/URL] Website [url=http://runewave.com]runewave.com[/url] ll Forums [url=http://runewave.com/forum/]http://runewave.com/forum/[/url] ll Webclient [url=http://runewave.com/home/webclient.html]http://runewave.com/home/webclient.html[/url]
Media: [youtube]s://www.youtube.com/watch?v=v2hGs4uJLyo]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=v2hGs4uJLyo[/youtube]
Credits: Vobex
Intro: RuneWave is one of the newest, most modern and unique servers out there, its here to provide you with the best RSPS experience available. With new content every week, your adventure is long lasting and addicting. We offer only the best and most unique game play available.
Our MANY Features: - An incredibly well balanced economy, with prices that aren't too easy to reach, yet they aren't too hard either. -All skills can be fully trained, with multiple ways to go about raising your levels. - A perfect combat system and pvm systems. - Fully functioning clan chat system,we have a help clan if you need help of any sort. - A fully working webclient (the link is at the top) for players who don't enjoy a desktop/downloadable client. - A fully working desktop/downloadable client (the link is on forums) for players who don't enjoy a webclient.

Credits: Vobex

Intro:
RuneWave is one of the newest, most modern and unique servers out there, its here to provide you with the best RSPS experience available. With new content every week, your adventure is long lasting and addicting. We offer only the best and most unique game play available.

Our MANY Features:

  • An incredibly well balanced economy, with prices that aren’t too easy to reach, yet they aren’t too hard either.
    -All skills can be fully trained, with multiple ways to go about raising your levels.
  • A perfect combat system and pvm systems.
  • Fully functioning clan chat system,we have a help clan if you need help of any sort.
  • A fully working webclient (the link is at the top) for players who don’t enjoy a desktop/downloadable client.
  • A fully working desktop/downloadable client (the link is on forums) for players who don’t enjoy a webclient.
